info.name: NovaFlow API Action Runner
info.description: Comprehensive Postman collection for NovaFlow API Action Runner with all README examples

item.name: Ex1: Slack Notification After Data Fetch

body.raw: {"workflow":{"id":"data-fetch-notify","name":"Fetch Data and Notify Slack","steps":[{"id":"fetch-report","name":"Get Daily Report","action_request":{"api":{"url":"https://api.mycompany.com/reports/daily","method":"GET","payload_type":"NONE","request_timeout_sec":30}},"extract":[{"name":"total_count","json_path":"$.summary.total"},{"name":"success_count","json_path":"$.summary.success"},{"name":"error_count","json_path":"$.summary.errors"}]},{"id":"notify-slack","name":"Send Slack Notification","action_request":{"api":{"url":"https://hooks.slack.com/services/T00/B00/XXXX","method":"POST","payload_type":"JSON","payload":{"text":"Daily Report: ${total_count} processed, ${success_count} success, ${error_count} errors"},"request_timeout_sec":10}}}]},"inputs":{}}

item.name: Ex2: GitHub Release with Asset Upload

body.raw: {"workflow":{"id":"salesforce-lead-create","name":"Create Salesforce Lead with Account","steps":[{"id":"get-oauth-token","name":"Get Salesforce OAuth Token","action_request":{"api":{"url":"https://login.salesforce.com/services/oauth2/token","method":"POST","payload_type":"FORM_URLENCODED","payload":{"grant_type":"client_credentials","client_id":"${sf_client_id}","client_secret":"${sf_client_secret}"},"request_timeout_sec":30}},"extract":[{"name":"sf_token","json_path":"$.access_token"},{"name":"sf_instance_url","json_path":"$.instance_url"}]},{"id":"lookup-account","name":"Find Account by Name","action_request":{"api":{"url":"${sf_instance_url}/services/data/v58.0/query","method":"GET","payload_type":"NONE","query":{"q":"SELECT Id, Name FROM Account WHERE Name = '${account_name}' LIMIT 1"},"bearer_token":"${sf_token}","request_timeout_sec":30}},"extract":[{"name":"account_id","json_path":"$.records[0].Id"}]},{"id":"create-lead","name":"Create Lead","action_request":{"api":{"url":"${sf_instance_url}/services/data/v58.0/sobjects/Lead","method":"POST","payload_type":"JSON","payload":{"FirstName":"${first_name}","LastName":"${last_name}","Email":"${email}","Company":"${account_name}","AccountId":"${account_id}","LeadSource":"API"},"bearer_token":"${sf_token}","request_timeout_sec":30}},"extract":[{"name":"lead_id","json_path":"$.id"}]}]},"inputs":{"sf_client_id":"your-sf-client-id","sf_client_secret":"your-sf-client-secret","account_name":"Acme Corp","first_name":"John","last_name":"Doe","email":"john.doe@acme.com"}}

item.name: Ex4: AWS S3 Presigned URL Download

body.raw: {"workflow":{"id":"s3-download-process","name":"S3 Download and Process","steps":[{"id":"get-presigned-url","name":"Get S3 Presigned Download URL","action_request":{"api":{"url":"https://api.mycompany.com/s3/presigned-url","method":"POST","payload_type":"JSON","payload":{"bucket":"${bucket}","key":"${object_key}","action":"download","expires_in":3600},"request_timeout_sec":30},"auth_config":{"type":"oauth","token_url":"https://auth.mycompany.com/oauth/token","client_id":"${client_id}","client_secret":"${client_secret}","grant_type":"client_credentials"}},"extract":[{"name":"download_url","json_path":"$.presigned_url"}]},{"id":"download-file","name":"Download File from S3","action_request":{"api":{"url":"${download_url}","method":"GET","payload_type":"NONE","request_timeout_sec":300},"file_output":{"mode":"STREAM_TO_FILE","base_dir_key":"DATA_OUT","path":"downloads/${object_key}","overwrite":true}},"retry_count":3,"retry_delay_ms":5000},{"id":"notify-complete","name":"Send Completion Webhook","action_request":{"api":{"url":"https://api.mycompany.com/webhooks/download-complete","method":"POST","payload_type":"JSON","payload":{"bucket":"${bucket}","key":"${object_key}","status":"completed"},"request_timeout_sec":10}}}]},"inputs":{"bucket":"my-data-bucket","object_key":"exports/2024/report.csv","client_id":"api-client","client_secret":"secret123"}}

{"workflow":{"id":"jira-issue-attachment","name":"Create Jira Issue with Attachment","steps":[{"id":"create-issue","name":"Create Jira Issue","action_request":{"api":{"url":"https://${jira_domain}/rest/api/3/issue","method":"POST","payload_type":"JSON","payload":{"fields":{"project":{"key":"${project_key}"},"summary":"${issue_summary}","description":{"type":"doc","version":1,"content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"${issue_description}"}]}]},"issuetype":{"name":"Bug"}}},"basic_auth":{"username":"${jira_email}","password":"${jira_api_token}"},"request_timeout_sec":30}},"extract":[{"name":"issue_id","json_path":"$.id"},{"name":"issue_key","json_path":"$.key"}]},{"id":"add-attachment","name":"Add Attachment to Issue","action_request":{"api":{"url":"https://${jira_domain}/rest/api/3/issue/${issue_key}/attachments","method":"POST","payload_type":"MULTIPART_FORM","headers":{"X-Atlassian-Token":"no-check"},"basic_auth":{"username":"${jira_email}","password":"${jira_api_token}"},"request_timeout_sec":60},"file_input":{"mode":"LOCAL_PATH","base_dir_key":"DATA_IN","path":"${attachment_path}","content_type":"application/octet-stream"}},"extract":[{"name":"attachment_id","json_path":"$[0].id"}]}]},"inputs":{"jira_domain":"mycompany.atlassian.net","jira_email":"user@mycompany.com","jira_api_token":"ATATT3xFfGF0xxxx","project_key":"PROJ","issue_summary":"Bug: Application crash on startup","issue_description":"See attached logs for details.","attachment_path":"logs/crash-report.txt"}}

item.name: Ex7: SendGrid Email with Dynamic Content

body.raw: {"workflow":{"id":"docusign-envelope","name":"Create DocuSign Envelope","steps":[{"id":"get-docusign-token","name":"Get DocuSign Access Token","action_request":{"api":{"url":"https://account-d.docusign.com/oauth/token","method":"POST","payload_type":"FORM_URLENCODED","payload":{"grant_type":"urn:ietf:params:oauth:grant-type:jwt-bearer","assertion":"${jwt_token}"},"request_timeout_sec":30}},"extract":[{"name":"ds_token","json_path":"$.access_token"}]},{"id":"create-envelope","name":"Create Envelope","action_request":{"api":{"url":"https://demo.docusign.net/restapi/v2.1/accounts/${account_id}/envelopes","method":"POST","payload_type":"JSON","payload":{"emailSubject":"${email_subject}","documents":[{"documentId":"1","name":"${document_name}","documentBase64":"${document_base64}"}],"recipients":{"signers":[{"email":"${signer_email}","name":"${signer_name}","recipientId":"1","tabs":{"signHereTabs":[{"documentId":"1","pageNumber":"1","xPosition":"100","yPosition":"700"}]}}]},"status":"sent"},"bearer_token":"${ds_token}","request_timeout_sec":60}},"extract":[{"name":"envelope_id","json_path":"$.envelopeId"},{"name":"envelope_uri","json_path":"$.uri"}]}]},"inputs":{"jwt_token":"eyJhbGciOiJSUzI1...","account_id":"12345678","email_subject":"Please sign this document","document_name":"Contract.pdf","document_base64":"JVBERi0xLjQK...","signer_email":"signer@example.com","signer_name":"John Doe"}}

{"workflow":{"id":"twilio-sms-verify","name":"SMS Verification","steps":[{"id":"send-sms","name":"Send SMS via Twilio","action_request":{"api":{"url":"https://api.twilio.com/2010-04-01/Accounts/${account_sid}/Messages.json","method":"POST","payload_type":"FORM_URLENCODED","payload":{"To":"${phone_number}","From":"${twilio_phone}","Body":"Your verification code is: ${verification_code}"},"basic_auth":{"username":"${account_sid}","password":"${auth_token}"},"request_timeout_sec":30}},"extract":[{"name":"message_sid","json_path":"$.sid"},{"name":"message_status","json_path":"$.status"}]},{"id":"log-verification","name":"Log Verification Attempt","action_request":{"api":{"url":"https://api.mycompany.com/verification-log","method":"POST","payload_type":"JSON","payload":{"phone":"${phone_number}","message_sid":"${message_sid}","status":"${message_status}","user_id":"${user_id}"},"bearer_token":"${internal_api_token}","request_timeout_sec":10}}}]},"inputs":{"account_sid":"ACxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx","auth_token":"your_auth_token","twilio_phone":"+15551234567","phone_number":"+15559876543","verification_code":"123456","user_id":"usr_abc123","internal_api_token":"internal-token"}}

{"workflow":{"id":"presigned-upload-invoice","name":"Upload and Create Invoice","steps":[{"id":"step1-get-presigned-url","name":"Get Presigned Upload URL","action_request":{"api":{"url":"https://api.example.com/storage/presigned-url","method":"POST","payload_type":"JSON","payload":{"action":"upload","content_type":"text/csv"},"request_timeout_sec":30},"auth_config":{"type":"oauth","token_url":"https://auth.example.com/oauth/token","client_id":"${oauth_client_id}","client_secret":"${oauth_client_secret}","grant_type":"client_credentials"}},"extract":[{"name":"presigned_url","json_path":"$.data.upload_url"},{"name":"request_id","json_path":"$.data.request_id"}]},{"id":"step2-upload-file","name":"Upload File to Presigned URL","action_request":{"api":{"url":"${presigned_url}","method":"PUT","payload_type":"FILE_BYTES","request_timeout_sec":120},"file_input":{"mode":"LOCAL_PATH","base_dir_key":"DATA_IN","path":"${filename}","content_type":"text/csv"}},"retry_count":2,"retry_delay_ms":2000},{"id":"step3-check-status","name":"Check Upload Status","action_request":{"api":{"url":"https://api.example.com/storage/status/${request_id}","method":"GET","payload_type":"NONE","request_timeout_sec":30},"auth_config":{"type":"oauth","token_url":"https://auth.example.com/oauth/token","client_id":"${oauth_client_id}","client_secret":"${oauth_client_secret}","grant_type":"client_credentials"}},"extract":[{"name":"file_url","json_path":"$.data.file_url"}]},{"id":"step4-create-invoice","name":"Create Invoice","action_request":{"api":{"url":"https://api.example.com/invoices","method":"POST","payload_type":"JSON","payload":{"filename":"${filename}","file_url":"${file_url}"},"request_timeout_sec":30},"auth_config":{"type":"oauth","token_url":"https://auth.example.com/oauth/token","client_id":"${oauth_client_id}","client_secret":"${oauth_client_secret}","grant_type":"client_credentials"}},"extract":[{"name":"invoice_id","json_path":"$.data.invoice_id"}]},{"id":"step5-get-invoice-status","name":"Get Invoice Status","action_request":{"api":{"url":"https://api.example.com/invoices/${invoice_id}/status","method":"GET","payload_type":"NONE","request_timeout_sec":30},"auth_config":{"type":"oauth","token_url":"https://auth.example.com/oauth/token","client_id":"${oauth_client_id}","client_secret":"${oauth_client_secret}","grant_type":"client_credentials"}},"extract":[{"name":"invoice_status","json_path":"$.data.status"}]}]},"inputs":{"filename":"invoice_data.csv","oauth_client_id":"your-client-id","oauth_client_secret":"your-client-secret"}}
